greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimum prime p such that prime(n)*p - 2 is prime.
comment: Conjecture: a(n) <= prime(n). Tested to n=10000.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[p=Prime[n]; k=1; pk=Prime[k]; cp=p*pk-2; While[ !PrimeQ[cp], k=k+1; pk=Prime[k]; cp=p*pk-2]; pk, {n, 100}]
results.author: _Lei Zhou_, Feb 22 2005
